price: 56 eux et leurs épouses, accoudés à l’ombre sur des lits somptueux.
arabic: هُمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجُهُمۡ فِي ظِلَٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: hum wa-azwājuhum fī ẓilālin ʿalā al-arāiki muttakiūna
